description: Detects the use of Windows hacktools based on their import hash (imphash) even if the files have been renamed Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate use of one of these tools
